content.intro: Your website speed directly impacts your sales. A site that loads in 1 second converts 3x more than a site that takes 5 seconds. Here's how we create ultra-fast sites with Next.js.

sections.content: Google penalizes slow sites in its ranking. 53% of mobile users abandon a site that takes more than 3 seconds to load. In Senegal and Morocco, where internet connection can be limited, having a fast site is even more important.

sections.title: Next.js: The framework of the future
sections.content: Next.js is the React framework used by Netflix, TikTok and Uber. It allows you to create ultra-fast sites thanks to Server-Side Rendering (SSR), Static Site Generation (SSG), and automatic image optimization.

• Optimized WebP images (-70% weight)
• Intelligent lazy loading
• Automatic code splitting
• Global CDN (Vercel)
• Optimized cache
• Google PageSpeed score 95+
• Loading time < 1.5s

vertex-ai-vs-alternatives.title: Vertex AI vs other AI solutions: Why we exclusively use Vertex AI
vertex-ai-vs-alternatives.excerpt: Detailed comparison between Vertex AI, OpenAI, Hugging Face and Google AI Studio. Discover why Vertex AI is the best choice for African SMEs.
vertex-ai-vs-alternatives.author: OMA Digital Team

content.intro: At OMA Digital, we exclusively use Google's Vertex AI for our AI solutions. Here's why it's the best choice for SMEs in Senegal and Morocco.

sections.title: What is Vertex AI?
sections.content: Vertex AI is Google Cloud's artificial intelligence platform. It offers world-class language models (LLM), speech recognition (STT), and text-to-speech (TTS), with unmatched security and reliability.

sections.title: Vertex AI vs OpenAI (ChatGPT)
sections.content:
Vertex AI: Hosting in Europe, GDPR compliance, latency <200ms, native multilingual support, transparent pricing.

OpenAI: USA hosting, GDPR issues, variable latency, limited support for African languages, fluctuating prices.

sections.title: Vertex AI vs Hugging Face
sections.content:
Vertex AI: Optimized models, managed infrastructure, automatic scaling, 24/7 support.

Hugging Face: Requires technical expertise, infrastructure to manage, hidden costs, no support.

sections.title: Vertex AI vs Google AI Studio
sections.content:
Vertex AI: Production-ready, guaranteed SLAs, enterprise security, stable API.

Google AI Studio: Experimental, no SLA, limited, not recommended for production.

sections.title: Why Vertex AI for Africa?
sections.content:
• Native support for African French and Moroccan Arabic
• Optimized latency from Europe
• GDPR compliance (important for your European customers)
• Automatic scaling (handles traffic spikes)
• Predictable pricing (no surprises)
• Google Cloud 24/7 support

sections.title: Our commitment
sections.content: We commit to using 100% Vertex AI for all our projects. No Google AI Studio, no Hugging Face, no low-cost solutions. Only the best technology for our clients.
